Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor the Charlotte Hornets to win based on their recent performance.
Coach Steve Clifford emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense for the Hornets.
The duel between LaMelo Ball and Cade Cunningham was highlighted as the key matchup.
Others: The game was played at the Spectrum Center in Charlotte.
The Hornets are without Grant Williams and Tre Mann due to injuries.
Tim Hardaway Jr. and Jaden Ivey are out for the Pistons due to back and leg injuries, respectively.
